tutor.name: Johny Smith
tutor.description: I am a tutor with 10 years of experience in teaching English Literature. I have a PHd in English Literature from the University of Toronto. I have taught at the University of Toronto for 5 years. I have a passion for teaching and I love to help students improve their English skills.
